text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza

title: IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza

status: draft

date: 2023-04-13 07:36:12+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Seasonal Influenza vaccine at 6 months of age, and then once a year.

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT21

action

title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - No Doses at 6 months old

description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because no doses at 6 months old in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because no doses at 6 months old in a 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - 1st Dose given 4 weeks ago

description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Seasonal Influenza dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" < 9text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual Re-vaccination

description: Provide Seasonal influenza revaccination – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – Annual dose" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Patient has completed Seasonal influenza primary series" = TRUEtext/cqlShould Re-vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Seasonal Influenza dose given" >= "1 year"text/cqlShould Re-vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza.03

name: IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza
title: IMMZ.DT.21.SeasonalInfluenza
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Seasonal Influenza vaccine at 6 months of age, and then once a year.

action.title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - No Doses at 6 months old
action.description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because no doses at 6 months old in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because no doses at 6 months old in a 2 dose scheme

action.title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - 1st Dose given 4 weeks ago
action.description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme

expression.description: "Date last Seasonal Influenza dose given" >= "4 weeks"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme

action.title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual Re-vaccination
action.description: Provide Seasonal influenza revaccination – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – Annual dose" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Patient has completed Seasonal influenza primary series" = TRUE
expression.expression: Should Re-vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual dose

expression.description: "Date last Seasonal Influenza dose given" >= "1 year"
expression.expression: Should Re-vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual dose
